name: CaveRunner (TyrantsWrath)
description:
A fun little 2d Platformer game made in Unity. 

It is a small side project made while working on my main project.

Controls:

A-D to move W-S to climb  Space to jump, and left click to shoot fireballs.

Life count is Displayed on the top left of the Screen, and Coin count on the top right.

Avoid the obstacles, water and kill the enemies.

You goal is to find the the exit sign and wait 3 seconds to load into the next level.
